items.title: Happy World Cocktail Day!
items.excerpt: World Cocktail Day occurs every May 13. It’s a day set aside to globally recognize and celebrate the joy of cocktails—so, it’s a big one. World Cocktail Day is also Bevvy’s birthday. We’ve been writing about cocktails and spirits for nearly 16 years, with 11 of those years fal…
